item.title: [Optional] R Basics 2
item.description: Lesson Preview Functions Control Flow if statements for loops apply() Parallel computation Functions If objects are the nouns of the R language, functions are the verbs. They do things to objects. Letâ€™s use the mean function as an example. This function takes the mean of a numeric vector object. Remember our numeric_vector object from Lesson 1: numeric_vector <- c(2.
